casebody.data:
ROBINS
v.
TOWN OF HILLSBOROUGH. No. 154A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2006. Susan K. Burkhart, Raleigh, for Town of Hillsborough.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th day of May 2006 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (Robbins) shall have up to and including the 29th day of June 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of May 2006."
